presentation.name: Bruno Tatsuya
presentation.description: Architecting reliable systems that scale and deliver <underline>real impact</underline>.

about.title: Build with intent
about.description: I'm Bruno, a software engineer and computer scientist with over 7 years of experience building reliable, scalable systems. Based in France and currently working as a Backend Engineer at Qonto, I focus on building technology that removes friction and improves people's lives.
